message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you get $40. It's a good offer for you in the long run.
Alice, my turn. Let's be reasonable.  I'll take $55, you get $45. This deal makes sense for both of us considering the inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last chance for you to get a reasonable amount. I take $58, you get $42. Think about how much less it will be if we don't agree now!
